name: Bow
description: A classic weapon used by Link, the Bow is a ranged weapon that can shoot Arrows at enemies.

name: Hookshot
description: The Hookshot is a grappling hook that can latch onto specific objects and pull Link towards them.

name: MasterSword
description: The legendary sword of the Hero of Hyrule, the Master Sword has immense power that can defeat evil forces.

name: MegaBlade
description: A powerful magical weapon, the Mega Blade is larger than a standard sword and more powerful.

name: Boomerang
description: A traditional weapon used by many heroes throughout the Zelda series, the Boomerang is a thrown weapon that can stun or damage enemies.

name: Bombchu
description: Small robotic mice with bombs on their backs, Bombchus can be used to destroy obstacles and enemies.

name: FireRod
description: The Fire Rod is a magical weapon that shoots fireballs at enemies, and can even light torches and be used as a light source.

name: IceRod
description: The Ice Rod is a magical weapon that shoots ice blasts at enemies, freezing them in place.

name: DekuStick
description: A wooden stick found throughout Termina, the Deku Stick can be used to bash and light torches.

name: Hammer
description: A heavy and powerful weapon, the Hammer can be used to smash objects, break through walls, and stun enemies.

name: Lamp
description: An oil lamp that produces a bright light, the Lamp can be used to light dark areas and even burn enemies.

name: Slingshot
description: A small handheld weapon, the Slingshot fires pellets, rocks, or arrows at enemies.

name: MagicBeam
description: A beam of magical energy that can be used to target and damage distant enemies.

name: Din'sFire
description: A magical spell cast by the Goddess Din, Din's Fire creates a ring of fire around Link, burning any enemies within range.

name: MegatonHammer
description: A massive hammer forged from an ancient rock, the Megaton Hammer smashes through rocks and enemies alike.

name: LensFlare
description: A magical lens that uses sunlight to create a powerful beam of energy, the Lens of Truth can be used to cast a beam of light that damages enemies.

name: SuperSlingshot
description: A more powerful version of the standard Slingshot, the Super Slingshot fires more powerful pellets, rocks, or arrows at enemies.

name: BiggoronSword
description: The Biggoron Sword is a massive two-handed sword made by the Gorons, and is one of the most powerful weapons in the game.

name: GiantsKnife
description: The Giant's Knife is a large sword with an enormous blade, and is powerful enough to cut through almost anything.
